trans-unit.source: Provides data for the CustomizeMapAreas event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control.
This class provides data for the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeMapAreas> event of the Chart control.

The only property of this class is the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeMapAreasEventArgs.MapAreaItems%2A>s property, which enables developers to: - Delete or customize map areas that have been created for a chart object; any <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine> object that has a non-empty `Url`, `MapAreaAttributes` or `ToolTip` property will have an associated map area object.
- Add custom map areas that have a user-defined shape and coordinates.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeMapAreasEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified map areas collection.
Can be used to remove or modify map areas that correspond to a chart object, or to add custom map areas.

This property allows you to: - Delete or customize map areas that have been created for a chart object; any <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine> object that has a non-empty `Url`, `MapAreaAttributes` or `ToolTip` property will have an associated map area object.
- Add custom map areas that have a user-defined shape and coordinates.
